message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

This paper is about image captioning, which is a task in computer vision (cs.CV). It also involves natural language generation (cs.CL) and generative models (cs.LG). The use of Policy Gradient, a strategy from Reinforcement Learning, suggests a connection to artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the evaluation of the method on large datasets suggests a possible connection to information retrieval (cs.IR).
